sub_title: E-commerce | Digital Marketing | Marketplaces | Shopify & Dropshipping | International Marketer | Online sales in EMEA
summary:
I am an E-commerce & Digital Marketing professional with 8+ years’ experience. Worked with leading retailers & Telcos across EMEA to increase online sales, in close alignment with different fields in Digital Marketing: Campaigns & Strategy, Content Marketing, Content & Conversion Optimization, Analytics & Reporting and Social Media.

Experienced international marketer of managing projects with: Amazon (DE, UK, FR, IT, ES, NL, SW, ME), Dixons, Bol.com, Elkjop, Media Markt, Deutsche Telekom, 1&1, Proximus and more on their Digital & eCommerce properties.

Motivated and self-disciplined professional with a MSc. in Economics and Business (specialized in Marketing), with a high interest in AI, VR, Metaverse and Blockchain.

education.field_of_study: Economics and Business - Specialisation in Marketing

awards.title: Most Valuable Player Award (MVP)
awards.description: Q2 Most Valuable Player award within Sales & Marketing EMEA: "Long played a key role in the product launch of the New Norton 360 product across EMEA with ready-to-go digital marketing assets for local countries and online retail partners."

profile_positions.description:
Welcome to Kikkerland Design Inc., where creativity runs rampant and even the most utilitarian gadget becomes a delightful discovery. Since 1992, the folks at Kikkerland Design have traveled the world in search of original designs for things that can make life more enjoyable. 

Responsible for the overall online business and Digital Marketing in Europe:
- Amazon Europe (B2B - Vendor & B2C - Seller)
- Bol.com
- Allegro
- www.kikkerlandeu.com
- E-commerce properties of key brick-and-mortar store partners
- Online B2B wholesale
profile_positions.title: E-commerce & Digital Marketing Europe

profile_positions.description:
NortonLifeLock Inc. is a global leader in consumer Cyber Safety. We are dedicated to helping secure the devices, identities, online privacy, and home and family needs of nearly 50 million consumers, providing them with a trusted ally in a complex digital world.

Received Most Valuable Player Award (MVP), Sep 2019 from VP Sales & Marketing, EMEA.

- Create conversion optimized digital toolkits and partners specific assets and delivering in time for a successful product launch of N360 in 15 countries across EMEA - to ensure quality, relevance and consistency for all EMEA territories aligned to territory plans
- Monitor and optimize all Amazon Marketing activities (AVS, AMS, AAP, AMG, retail Marketing, A+ content) for 5 countries throughout EMEA
- Work closely with 8 local Sales & Marketing teams to help partners to optimize content and user experience on their Digital and eCommerce properties
- Drive, track and report 3 (on average per quarter) local Digital Marketing campaign results to optimise future activities
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Focus on driving online sales and marketing efforts for Norton in the Benelux and responsible for converting traffic on our partner websites into sales for Norton.

- Work directly with online partners to optimize customer experience, product pages, landing pages and conversion rate
- Close teamwork with Field Marketing Specialist making sure we have a seamless CX in store and online for the Norton brand
- Analyze marketing data and develop insights to identify business needs or improvement opportunities
- Negotiate, plan and implement marketing programs that increase bookings and activations
- Produce high quality, effective marketing messaging and promotions on a quarterly basis
profile_positions.title: Online Trade Marketer Benelux
